track.name: Arms
comments: You put your arms around me and I'm home <3
♫♥♫  I never thought that you'd be the one to hold my heart ♫♥♫
I've never truly loved till you <3

There's also an official lyric video of "Arms" at: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FvbErM6ZTBA&list=PLa7aYMVV7VdqBO2ryznC8sP6jr3awBwHs 

I absolutely LOVE this song, both videos, and what they mean to me.
Special song ♫♥♫
Haven't heard Christina  before. Love at first listen...a little funky-time piano...like! Nice to look at...nice voice...and I dig the tats.
The best track of Lovestrong.
I totally forgot how brilliant this song is <33
acoustic or not i love this song!
certified GOLD by RIAA <3 well done Christina!
finally the real version
is this shit live? cut it out last.fm ill see someone in concert if i want this crap
hope that you see right thru
I love this! This song is amazing!
is this live? did her voice just crack?
I wanna lay under a tree, with my face to the ground and cry until the leaves are gone.  [2]
I really like the music on this. It has a great vibe.
Arm vs Jar of Hearts < who cares love them both ...
I miss him. So much. Please come back Scott.
